coexistence_simulator.antennas.create_array_config

Helpers to generate antenna array configuration files.

This module converts per‑element geometry and pattern information into a single JSON description that downstream blocks can consume. The public entry point, :pyfunc:`create_array_config`, writes a self‑contained file that records element locations, boresight bearings, and a common carrier frequency.

Functions

create_array_config(element_positions, ...)

Write a JSON configuration for a user‑defined antenna array.
